document_type: Requests for Approval and Site Reports
title: Request to upgrade HFO tanks and Bunds
metadata_json:
{"compliance_id": "9dab33c7-f5ea-ef11-a372-0050568a2d1a", "document_type": "Requests for Approval and Site Reports", "document_url": "https://data.epa.ie/leap/api/v1/LicenseeReturns/byid?lr_id=9dab33c7-f5ea-ef11-a372-0050568a2d1a", "title": "Request to upgrade HFO tanks and Bunds", "description": "Dear Joshua,


The ESB (Electricity Supply Board) has agreed a Targeted Contacting Mechanism agreement with Eirgrid to operate as an out of market generator post July 2025. It is planned that the site will transition from combustion of coal as a primary fuel source to combustion of heavy fuel oil in 2025. Planning application has been granted by An Bord Pleanála under  ABP-319080-24.


ESB are submitting the following condition 1.4 request for installation of 2 no. new HFO storage tanks with 25,000 tonnes capacity in each tank, these will be located within the footprint of 2 no. existing bunds. The works will require 
the expansion of the volume of the current bunds and alteration of the existing structures to meet 
with the current standards for secondary containment of substances harmful to the environment.

Should you have any queries on the attached, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Kind regards,
Gemma", "submission_date": "", "status": "Closed", "metadata": "{"licenseereturnid": "9dab33c7-f5ea-ef11-a372-0050568a2d1a", "type": "Requests for Approval and Site Reports", "reference": "LR091135", "subject": "Requests for Approval (RFA) and Site Reports:Other", "status": "Closed", "licenceid": "26f6aad0-c4ad-4889-beb1-7a812800033c", "licenceprofileid": "d7347f12-ed09-4cff-b9e0-6b40203819d8", "datereceived": "2025-02-14T00:00:00", "closeddate": "2025-07-02T00:00:00", "title": "Request to upgrade HFO tanks and Bunds", "doctype": "Requests for Approval (RFA) and Site Reports", "docsubtype": "Other", "decision": "Withdrawn", "description": "Dear Joshua,\r\n\r\n\r\nThe ESB (Electricity Supply Board) has agreed a Targeted Contacting Mechanism agreement with Eirgrid to operate as an out of market generator post July 2025. It is planned that the site will transition from combustion of coal as a primary fuel source to combustion of heavy fuel oil in 2025. Planning application has been granted by An Bord Plean\u00e1la under  ABP-319080-24.\r\n\r\n\r\nESB are submitting the following condition 1.4 request for installation of 2 no. new HFO storage tanks with 25,000 tonnes capacity in each tank, these will be located within the footprint of 2 no. existing bunds. The works will require \r\nthe expansion of the volume of the current bunds and alteration of the existing structures to meet \r\nwith the current standards for secondary containment of substances harmful to the environment.\r\n\r\nShould you have any queries on the attached, please do not hesitate to reach out.\r\n\r\nKind regards,\r\nGemma", "documentcategory": null, "complianceinvestigationid": null}"}

{"compliance_id": "ce39d229-0af7-4e7b-8a2f-c20ba41b7652", "document_type": "Meeting", "document_url": "https://data.epa.ie/leap/api/v1/MeetingCorrespondence/meetingbyid?meeting_id=ce39d229-0af7-4e7b-8a2f-c20ba41b7652", "title": "", "description": "", "submission_date": "", "status": "Closed", "metadata": "{\"meetingid\": \"ce39d229-0af7-4e7b-8a2f-c20ba41b7652\", \"type\": \"Meeting\", \"reference\": \"MTG000750\", \"subject\": \"P1188-01, Aurivo Co-Operative Society Limited\", \"status\": \"Closed\", \"meetingdate\": \"2025-04-15T00:00:00\", \"organisationid\": \"b4b5ff99-91b3-411d-8be0-f436dda03180\", \"location\": \"Aurivo Animal Feeds Mill offices, Ballaghaderreen\", \"regarding\": \"Other\", \"meetingtime\": \"10:10\", \"attendeesepa\": \"Kealan Reynolds - Team Lead -Industrial Enforcement Inspector\\nIsabel Kerins - Inspector -Industrial Enforcement\", \"attendeesnoepa\": \"Orla O'Brien - Environmental Health & Safety Specialist\\nNorman Finnerty - Maintenance Manager\\nMiche\\u00e1l Connolly - Site Operations Manager\\nLaura McDermott - Quality, Healthy & Safety and Environmental Assistant\\nKieran Connaughton - Continuous Improvements Co-ordinator\", \"actionitems\": \"

\\n

\\n

  • Emission points on site.

    • \\n

    • \\n
  • EDEN Portal - the licensee shall provide the Agency with contact details for a secondary and tertiary contact for the facility via a licensee return using the EDEN portal.
    • \\n
\", \"licenceid\": \"42d34978-3d7e-46c8-89dd-4f116aecd3de\", \"originalmeetingid\": \"f46bcfd7-c81a-f011-a373-0050568a2d1a\", \"organisationname\": \"Aurivo Co-operative Society Limited\"}"}

{"compliance_id": "d1f4153a-f11f-47ec-8c67-d67be08865a7", "document_type": "Meeting", "document_url": "https://data.epa.ie/leap/api/v1/MeetingCorrespondence/meetingbyid?meeting_id=d1f4153a-f11f-47ec-8c67-d67be08865a7", "title": "", "description": "", "submission_date": "", "status": "Closed", "metadata": "{\"meetingid\": \"d1f4153a-f11f-47ec-8c67-d67be08865a7\", \"type\": \"Meeting\", \"reference\": \"MTG000746\", \"subject\": \"Ringsend WWTP upgrade project update from Uisce \\u00c9ireann\", \"status\": \"Closed\", \"meetingdate\": \"2025-04-07T00:00:00\", \"organisationid\": \"f5545f77-3749-e211-9eb5-0050568a69e2\", \"location\": \"Online MS Teams\", \"regarding\": \"Compliance Investigations\", \"meetingtime\": \"12:00\", \"attendeesepa\": \"Lorcan Farrell, Stephen McCarthy, David Shannon\", \"attendeesnoepa\": \"Uisce \\u00c9ireann: Ringsend WWTP Upgrade Project Team, Compliance Team & Asset Operations\\n\", \"actionitems\": \"

A video conference meeting was held between the EPA and Uisce Éireann (UÉ) on 08/04/2025 from 12:00 to 12:50 approx.

\\n

During the meeting UÉ gave an update to the EPA on the phased upgrades being undertaken at Ringsend WWTP and a summary of treatment plant performance for Q1 2025.

\\n

Works on Hybrid II upgrades and sludge treatment facilities are progressing as scheduled with all primary aspects of the upgrade project due for completion by end 2025. A programme of ancillary works connected with the overall upgrade project is also being progressed with most completion dates falling within 2025.

\\n

A summary of plant performance was given. UÉ are aiming for 104 compliance samples to be taken during 2025. 10 no. samples records were recorded in the Q1 Update under compliance investigation (CI000025).  Compliance results were unavailable for the first three weeks of January. This was attributed to operational reasons (plant shutdowns) and management changeover. It is UÉ’s intention to make up the shortfall to 104 compliance samples over the year. It was acknowledged that there is a risk that TN and TP average limits may not be achieved this year. UÉ expect that performance will improve across all parameters once remaining upgraded SBR blocks come back on-line and as average air temperatures increase through the year. UÉ confirmed that higher than expected load on the plant (2.17 PE in 2024) was expected to continue increasing in 2025 and is also affecting treatment performance. Issues with the aeration system in the Capital Upgrade treatment block were also cited as a compounding factor in treatment performance and should be resolved by end April 2025.

\\n

The EPA instructed Uisce Éireann to carry out all actions necessary to comply with the waste water discharge licence.

\", \"licenceid\": \"4ab24fc5-2bf8-4aa8-ad9e-f4f68c559186\", \"originalmeetingid\": \"0d83b2ed-7614-f011-a373-0050568a2d1a\", \"organisationname\": \"Uisce \\u00c9ireann\"}"}
